job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement full-stack solutions for time-series anomaly detection, generative AI solutions, tabular data classification, and alert prioritization.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions designing and implementing solutions for various modeling tasks like anomaly detection, generative AI, and classification.

job_tasks.phrase: expertise in one or more of the following areas: time-series modeling and anomaly detection, classification of tabular data, creating Generative AI applications.
job_tasks.justification: This directly lists core modeling tasks and expertise areas.
This indicates involvement in building complete software solutions, which extends beyond just model development to include application architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: working closely with our main engineering team to make these innovations come to life.
job_tasks.justification: Implies collaboration and contribution to the practical implementation of developed solutions within an engineering context.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the product development lifecycle from conception to deployment
job_tasks.justification: This covers the end-to-end process of bringing a product or feature to life, which is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: building data products or software intended for external users.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights experience in creating user-facing software products.
Directly states the need for working alongside software engineering functions.

job_tasks.phrase: eager to dive into general software engineering projects and expand your skill set beyond AI and modeling.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates a willingness to engage in broader software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Solid experience with code versioning, continuous integration, and continuous deployment tools, like Git, Github Actions, and Pytest
job_tasks.justification: Mentions CI/CD tools and practices essential for MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Knowledge of deployment and DevOps tools like Terraform and Kubernetes is a plus.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions DevOps tools relevant to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the charge in exploring and defining the future of data quality tooling at Soda, focusing on automating mundane tasks to allow for more significant problem-solving opportunities.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the business context of data quality and defining strategic direction for tooling.

job_tasks.phrase: understanding user needs and technical challenges, brainstorming solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to comprehend user requirements and translate them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: communicating directly with customers to understand their needs
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes understanding customer needs, which is a key aspect of business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: You excel at understanding user needs and technical challenges, brainstorming solutions, and learning new methods as necessary.
You're comfortable admitting when you don't have all the answers but are confident in your ability to find them.
eager to dive into general software engineering projects and expand your skill set beyond AI and modeling.
Collaborate closely with software engineers and other team members
High emotional intelligence, with strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work effectively in a remote-first, asynchronous environment.
proactive approach to product development, contributing ideas
A deep commitment to diversity and inclusion, ensuring respectful and effective communication across diverse backgrounds and identities.

classification.rationale: This role heavily emphasizes traditional ML tasks like time-series anomaly detection and tabular data classification, alongside building customer-facing products. While Generative AI is mentioned, it's presented as one of several specializations, and the core responsibilities lean towards building robust, production-ready ML solutions and integrating them into software.
